EmailTemplate.name: Rollover Letter
EmailTemplate.subject: Rollover Letter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Opportunity.CreatedDate}
Dear {!Opportunity.Name},
I wish to acknowledge and confirm your request to change {!Opportunity.Student_Name__c}'s Application for Enrolment to entry in {!Opportunity.Future_Enrolment_Date__c}
The application has been placed on the waiting list and will be subject to places being available.
If you have any further queries, please do not hesitate to contact me on 9286 9579
Yours Sincerely
Gail Zietsch Enrolment Assistant
